price: 100. Qofkii ka jeesta wuxuu xambaaran Maalinta Qiyaame culaab culus (denbi).
arabic: مَّنۡ أَعۡرَضَ عَنۡهُ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَحۡمِلُ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ وِزۡرًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: man aʿraḍa ʿanhu fa-innahu yaḥmilu yawma al-qiyāmati wiz'ran
